allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update sport.html and consultation.html with new content and screenshots

- sport.html: Removed partner logos \(EHCB, Cork City, Žilina\), added desktop screenshot, reduced phone mockup sizes by 20%, reorganized sections to side-by-side layouts, moved screenshots between sections
- consultation.html: Updated AI Solutions section with 6 new solutions including screenshots and refined descriptions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update partner logos: Remove 9 partners and create centralized logo system

- Removed partner logos: Delo, EHCB, HINA, Cork City, Meridianbet, Dnevno Hr, Zagreb Info, Ora De Sibiu, Žilina
- Added Nova S logo in place of Delo
- Created centralized partner logos system in js/partner-logos.js
- Added comprehensive partner logos usage guide
- Updated projects_v2.html with enhanced design \(bento grid, glass dashboard, ledger cards\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
